properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: Difines how long(in seconds) a JWT token remains valid before expiring

properties.name: jwt.private.key
properties.description: The private key used to verify JWT tokens

properties.name: jwt.public.key
properties.description: The public key used to verify JWT token signatures

properties.name: kafka.topic.name
properties.description: THe name of the Kafka topic used for messaging
